title: Looking for new friends!
body:
Good day,

My name is Dean and I am 21 years old. I have been playing League of Legends for about 9 years and am currently sitting at Silver 1.

All of my real-life friends (who played league) have moved onto bigger things in their lives, meanwhile, I am sitting here still playing League most afternoons/evenings. This makes me very sad and I would love it if I could make new friends and make many happy memories!

I am putting out the feelers to see if anyone is interested in making a new friend for life.

PM me in game IGN: Ðean

Just copy and paste my IGN to add me.

replies.body: i'll let you suck my toes

I tried to add you but didn't work ><

If you wish to add me there.

Invocadora Fatal

Well, it is kinda hard to find good friends nowadays idk
I appreciate your passion in this post and I'd like to take you up on your proposition, however the real reason I'm in it is for the toes and that only. Add me :)
